messageHandlers.script:
import traceback
	try:
		#Generate the report
		project = "HMS"
		path = "Overview/HopeUTable_Report"
		parameters = {'month':self.view.params.month,
					'year':self.view.params.year,
					'lastMonth':self.view.params.lastMonth,
					'dateBefore12Months':self.view.params.dateBefore12Months,
					'selectedDate':self.view.params.selectedDate
					}
		pdfFile = system.report.executeReport(path,project,parameters,fileType='pdf')
		filename = 'HopeUDashboard_' + str(system.date.format(system.date.now(),"yyyyMMddHHmmss")) + '.pdf'

		system.perspective.download(filename, pdfFile)
	except:   
		logger = system.util.getLogger("HopeU Dashboard tableToPDF")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

# implement your handler here
	system.perspective.print('HopeU_updated')
	self.refreshBinding('custom.sql_data')
	self.refreshBinding('props.data')

# implement your handler here
	system.perspective.print('HopeUMonthly_updated')
	self.refreshBinding('custom.sql_data')
	self.refreshBinding('props.data')
